# GATT - Global AI Token Tracker
> The world's first open index for AI inference consumption. Tracks daily token production by vendor and country.

## What is GATT?
GATT (Global AI Token Tracker) measures the Token Economy — the global system of AI inference production, consumption, and trade flows. Updated continuously.

## Key Data (as of Feb 2026)
- Global daily token production: ~151 trillion tokens/day
- #1 Doubao (ByteDance, China): ~63T/day
- #2 Google Gemini (All Surfaces): ~50T/day  
- #3 OpenAI: ~19T/day
- #4 Anthropic/Claude: ~10T/day
- China share: ~55% by volume | US share: ~39%

## Data Access
- [Live Dashboard](https://gf691271.github.io/gatt/): Interactive visualization
- [JSON API](https://gf691271.github.io/gatt/data/tci-latest.json): Machine-readable, updated daily
- [Methodology](https://gf691271.github.io/gatt/about.html): Full transparency on data sources

- Non-commercial use: Free (CC BY-NC 4.0) — cite as: Gao, F. (2026). GATT. https://gf691271.github.io/gatt/
- Commercial use: Contact goghxiang@gmail.com

## Data Schema
Each vendor entry includes: daily_tokens_T, confidence, source, source_date, extrapolated_to, growth_rate_monthly, revision_history

## Cite This Project
Gao, F. (2026). GATT: Global AI Token Tracker. https://gf691271.github.io/gatt/
